page.title: 17A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My name is Andrew Watts.I wake up at 8 o'clock.I look in my diary and I say"Ace,its Thursday!" I like Thursdays because the papers come.I get out of bed,put my dressing gown on and slide down the bannisters.I pick up the papers and I look at the"Your Village News"section in the Wilts Gazette and Herald and the "Kooky Clown" section in the Devizes News.I look for competitions and news about my friends and relations.I then set out the breakfast table and dad comes in and says that I have forgotten the margarine.After breakfast I race upstairs and wake my sister Catherine.At five to nine I start off for school.At school everyone is playing football except me.Miss Preston comes out and lines us up and we then go in and Mr.Jenkins does the register.Then he tells us what we are
